description: Drift List is currently in development. It is used to search information about animes, mangas and its other namings.
about: Drift List is created with NextJS, TypeScript, ChakraUI and consumes the unofficial MyAnimeList API, JikanAPI. Future iterations will have Prisma and PostgreSQL and allow user creation with their own lists.
author: Adriel Barangan
begin_search: Begin search by searching an anime by its name or by its type
